Today we present a bill to better typify and punish crimes against public order more rigorously.
The project considers as an aggravation of responsibility committing public disorder acting hooded and also sanctions the looting.
We want to ensure the right of all to demonstrate peacefully and publicly and that security prevails in the streets and not violence.

Today we inaugurate the new Clinical Hospital of the Magallanes Region and we will present the bill of incentives for extreme zones.
This project will benefit the Regions of Arica and Parinacota, Tarapacá, Los Lagos (Province of Palena and Chiloé), Aysén and Magallanes.
Strengthening, in these Regions, the special incentives in terms of investment, employment, tax credit and benefits to SMEs.

The Austral highway will allow us to unite Chile from Arica to Campos de Hielo and thus integrate our territory and our people.
We have to understand that Santiago is not Chile, we need a harmonious development of all regions, especially the most extreme ones.
In Villa Mañihuales and La Junta, Aysén, we announced an investment of close to US $ 600 million to pave 400 km of the Austral highway
